{{short description|Voice actor}}
'''Gordon Reid''' ([[6 September|September 6]], [[1939]] - [[26 November|November 26]], [[2003]]) provided the voice of [[Sandyman]] in the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series]], aired by the BBC. He also provided the voices of both [[Snaga (orc of Isengard)]] and [[Snaga (orc of Mordor)]].
